Welcome to my portfolio

About me

Hello there visitor! I'm Taj Brzovič Ciglar, a self-taught Front End Developer. When I finished high school, due to a great interest in sports, I decided to study physiotherapy.

I completed a 3-year physiotherapy faculty, but in the last year of study, I started learning programming and computer science again due to my continued passion for technology and programming. Thanks to resources like CS50 and The Odin Project, I transitioned into web development.

Beyond coding, I am love nature, going on hikes and especially I love to travel, meet new people and new cultures around the world. I am also a big foodie, especially for Asian cuisine. Sports also play a big role in my life, building both physical and mental strength.

Now, fully immersed in web dev, driven by curiosity and a hunger for growth, I embrace challenges both on-screen and off.

I enjoy embracing new challenges, tackling them with enthusiasm, and continually learning new things. I thrive as a team worker, enjoying collaborative environments. In my spare time, alongside sports and travel, I strive to learn as much new things as possible.
